title: The Evolution of LLM Architecture: From Simple Chatbot to Complex System
title1: LLM Architecture Evolution Guide: From Basic to Advanced - Helicone
title2: LLM Architecture Evolution Guide: From Simple Chatbot to Complex System - Helicone
description: Explore the stages of LLM application development, from a basic chatbot to a sophisticated system with vector databases, gateways, tools, and agents. Learn how LLM architecture evolves to meet scaling challenges and user demands.
author: Justin Torre
